title: Invisibility
content:
nvisibility Tips & Notes

Invisibility lasts 10 turns as of Early Access patch 9. Invisibility will not break upon casting the Minor Illusion cantrip, or upon looting a container. Note that interacting with non-container objects WILL break the spell. The Duergar racial version of this spell has no duration, and can be cast for free an unlimited number of times outside of combat.
